name: Untitled Tabletop Game
description:
Picture this: You are playing DnD with your friends. The wizard is taking an eternity reading their spells and the fighter is arguing with the DM about the rules of grappling for half an hour. Bored out of your mind, your dice tower crumbles and knock down the mini of the Big Bad Evil Guy. "He is dead! He fell in the lava pit and died" you scream, can we move forward now? And thus the rules of Untitled Tabletop Game we created.

Each dice have they own special effects!

CREDIT

One Bard Band by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
